elements.name: slot
elements.description: `<slot>` serve as content distribution outlets in component templates. `<slot>` itself will be replaced.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Used for named slot.

elements.name: share-element
elements.description: 共享元素，一种动画形式，类似于 flutter Hero动画，表现为元素像是在页面间穿越一样。该组件需与 page-container 组件结合使用。

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: 映射标记，与 page-container 中的 shar-element 对应。

attributes.name: transform
attributes.description: 是否进行动画

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: 动画时长，单位毫秒

attributes.name: easing-function
attributes.description: css 缓动函数

elements.name: page-container
elements.description: 页面容器，“假页”容器组件，效果类似于 popup 弹出层，页面内存在该容器时，当用户进行返回操作，关闭该容器不关闭页面。返回操作包括三种情形，右滑手势、安卓物理返回键和调用 navigateBack 接口。

attributes.name: show
attributes.description: 是否显示容器组件。

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: 动画时长，单位毫秒。

attributes.name: z-index
attributes.description: z-index 层级

attributes.name: overlay
attributes.description: 是否显示遮罩层。

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: 弹出位置。

attributes.name: round
attributes.description: 是否显示圆角

attributes.name: close-on-slideDown
attributes.description: 是否在下滑一段距离后关闭。

attributes.name: overlay-style
attributes.description: 自定义遮罩层样式。

attributes.name: custom-style
attributes.description: 自定义弹出层样式。

elements.name: block
elements.description: 仅作为逻辑渲染的容器

elements.name: template
elements.description: WXML提供模板（template），可以在模板中定义代码片段，然后在不同的地方调用。

attributes.name: is
attributes.description: 引用了模板的名称，对应template的name属性。

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: 模板的名称

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: 模板的数据

elements.name: import
elements.description: import可以在该文件中使用目标文件定义的template

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: 导入的wxml文件的路径

elements.name: include
elements.description: include 可以将目标文件除了 <template/> <wxs/> 外的整个代码引入，相当于是拷贝到 include 位置

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: 要包含的wxml文件的路径

elements.name: wxs
elements.description: 在wxml中嵌入wxs脚本

attributes.name: module
attributes.description: 此wxs模块的名称

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: 引入的wxs文件的路径

elements.name: qs
elements.description: 在wxml中嵌入qs脚本

attributes.name: module
attributes.description: 此qs模块的名称

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: 引入的qs文件的路径

elements.name: slot
elements.description: 自定义组件中可嵌入内容

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: 此插槽的名称

elements.name: view
elements.description: 视图容器

attributes.name: hover-class
attributes.description: 指定按下去的样式类。当 hover-class="none" 时，没有点击态效果

attributes.name: hover-stop-propagation
attributes.description: 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态

attributes.name: hover-start-time
attributes.description: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

attributes.name: hover-stay-time
attributes.description: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

elements.name: cover-image
elements.description: 覆盖在原生组件之上的图片视图。可覆盖的原生组件同cover-view，支持嵌套在cover-view里。

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: 图标路径，支持临时路径、网络地址（1.6.0起支持）、云文件ID（2.2.3起支持）。暂不支持base64格式。

elements.name: cover-view
elements.description: 覆盖在原生组件之上的文本视图

attributes.name: scroll-top
attributes.description: 设置顶部滚动偏移量，仅在设置了 overflow-y: scroll 成为滚动元素后生效

elements.name: movable-area
elements.description: movable-view的可移动区域

attributes.name: scale-area
attributes.description: 当里面的movable-view设置为支持双指缩放时，设置此值可将缩放手势生效区域修改为整个movable-area

elements.name: movable-view
elements.description: 可移动的视图容器，在页面中可以拖拽滑动。

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: movable-view的移动方向，属性值有all、vertical、horizontal、none

attributes.name: inertia
attributes.description: movable-view是否带有惯性

attributes.name: out-of-bounds
attributes.description: 超过可移动区域后，movable-view是否还可以移动

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: 定义x轴方向的偏移，如果x的值不在可移动范围内，会自动移动到可移动范围；改变x的值会触发动画

attributes.name: y
attributes.description: 定义y轴方向的偏移，如果y的值不在可移动范围内，会自动移动到可移动范围；改变y的值会触发动画

attributes.name: damping
attributes.description: 阻尼系数，用于控制x或y改变时的动画和过界回弹的动画，值越大移动越快

attributes.name: friction
attributes.description: 摩擦系数，用于控制惯性滑动的动画，值越大摩擦力越大，滑动越快停止；必须大于0，否则会被设置成默认值

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description: 是否支持双指缩放，默认缩放手势生效区域是在movable-view内

attributes.name: scale-min
attributes.description: 定义缩放倍数最小值

attributes.name: scale-max
attributes.description: 定义缩放倍数最大值

attributes.name: scale-value
attributes.description: 定义缩放倍数，取值范围为 0.5 - 10

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: 是否使用动画

elements.name: scroll-view
elements.description: 可滚动视图区域。使用竖向滚动时，需要给scroll-view一个固定高度，通过 WXSS 设置 height。组件属性的长度单位默认为px，2.4.0起支持传入单位(rpx/px)。

attributes.name: scroll-x
attributes.description: 允许横向滚动

attributes.name: scroll-y
attributes.description: 允许纵向滚动

attributes.name: upper-threshold
attributes.description: 距顶部/左边多远时，触发 scrolltoupper 事件

attributes.name: lower-threshold
attributes.description: 距底部/右边多远时，触发 scrolltolower 事件

attributes.name: scroll-top
attributes.description: 设置竖向滚动条位置

attributes.name: scroll-bottom
attributes.description: 设置横向滚动条位置

attributes.name: scroll-into-view
attributes.description: 值应为某子元素id（id不能以数字开头）。设置哪个方向可滚动，则在哪个方向滚动到该元素

attributes.name: scroll-with-animation
attributes.description: 在设置滚动条位置时使用动画过渡

attributes.name: enable-back-to-top
attributes.description: iOS点击顶部状态栏、安卓双击标题栏时，滚动条返回顶部，只支持竖向

attributes.name: enable-flex
attributes.description: 启用 flexbox 布局。开启后，当前节点声明了 display: flex 就会成为 flex container，并作用于其孩子节点。

attributes.name: scroll-anchoring
attributes.description: 开启 scroll anchoring 特性，即控制滚动位置不随内容变化而抖动，仅在 iOS 下生效，安卓下可参考 CSS overflow-anchor 属性。

attributes.name: refresher-enabled
attributes.description: 开启自定义下拉刷新

attributes.name: refresher-threshold
attributes.description: 设置自定义下拉刷新阈值

attributes.name: refresher-default-style
attributes.description: 设置自定义下拉刷新默认样式，支持设置 black | white | none， none 表示不使用默认样式

attributes.name: refresher-background
attributes.description: 设置自定义下拉刷新区域背景颜色

attributes.name: refresher-triggered
attributes.description: 设置当前下拉刷新状态，true 表示下拉刷新已经被触发，false 表示下拉刷新未被触发

elements.name: swiper
elements.description: 滑块视图容器。其中只可放置swiper-item组件，否则会导致未定义的行为。

attributes.name: indicator-dots
attributes.description: 是否显示面板指示点

attributes.name: indicator-color
attributes.description: 指示点颜色

attributes.name: indicator-active-color
attributes.description: 当前选中的指示点颜色

attributes.name: autoplay
attributes.description: 是否自动切换

attributes.name: current
attributes.description: 当前所在滑块的 index

attributes.name: interval
attributes.description: 自动切换时间间隔

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: 滑动动画时长

attributes.name: circular
attributes.description: 是否采用衔接滑动

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: 滑动方向是否为纵向

attributes.name: previous-margin
attributes.description: 前边距，可用于露出前一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值

attributes.name: next-margin
attributes.description: 后边距，可用于露出后一项的一小部分，接受 px 和 rpx 值

attributes.name: display-multiple-items
attributes.description: 同时显示的滑块数量

attributes.name: skip-hidden-item-layout
attributes.description: 是否跳过未显示的滑块布局，设为 true 可优化复杂情况下的滑动性能，但会丢失隐藏状态滑块的布局信息

attributes.name: easing-function
attributes.description: 指定 swiper 切换缓动动画类型

elements.name: swiper-item
elements.description: 仅可放置在swiper组件中，宽高自动设置为100%。

attributes.name: item-id
attributes.description: 该 swiper-item 的标识符

elements.name: icon
elements.description: 图标。组件属性的长度单位默认为px，2.4.0起支持传入单位(rpx/px)。

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: icon的类型

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: icon的大小

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: icon的颜色

elements.name: progress
elements.description: 进度条。组件属性的长度单位默认为px，2.4.0起支持传入单位(rpx/px)。

attributes.name: show-info
attributes.description: 在进度条右侧显示百分比

attributes.name: border-radius
attributes.description: 圆角大小

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.description: 右侧百分比字体大小

attributes.name: stroke-width
attributes.description: 进度条线的宽度

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: 进度条颜色

attributes.name: activeColor
attributes.description: 已选择的进度条的颜色

attributes.name: backgroundColor
attributes.description: 未选择的进度条的颜色

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: 进度条从左往右的动画

attributes.name: active-mode
attributes.description: backwards: 动画从头播；forwards：动画从上次结束点接着播

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: 进度增加1%所需毫秒数

elements.name: rich-text
elements.description: 富文本

attributes.name: nodes
attributes.description: 节点列表/HTML String

attributes.name: space
attributes.description: 显示连续空格

elements.name: text
elements.description: 文本

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: 文本是否可选

attributes.name: space
attributes.description: 显示连续空格

attributes.name: decode
attributes.description: 是否解码

elements.name: button
elements.description: 按钮

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: 按钮的大小

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: 按钮的样式类型

attributes.name: plain
attributes.description: 按钮是否镂空，背景色透明

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: 名称前是否带 loading 图标

attributes.name: form-type
attributes.description: 用于 form 组件，点击分别会触发 form 组件的 submit/reset 事件

attributes.name: open-type
attributes.description: 微信开放能力

attributes.name: hover-class
attributes.description: 指定按钮按下去的样式类

attributes.name: hover-stop-propagation
attributes.description: 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态

attributes.name: hover-start-time
attributes.description: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

attributes.name: hover-stay-time
attributes.description: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: 指定返回用户信息的语言

attributes.name: session-from
attributes.description: 会话来源，open-type="contact"时有效

attributes.name: send-message-title
attributes.description: 会话内消息卡片标题，open-type="contact"时有效

attributes.name: send-message-img
attributes.description: 会话内消息卡片图片，open-type="contact"时有效

attributes.name: send-message-path
attributes.description: 会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，open-type="contact"时有效

attributes.name: app-parameter
attributes.description: 打开 APP 时，向 APP 传递的参数，open-type=launchApp时有效

attributes.name: show-message-card
attributes.description: 是否显示会话内消息卡片，设置此参数为 true，用户进入客服会话会在右下角显示"可能要发送的小程序"提示，用户点击后可以快速发送小程序消息，open-type="contact"时有效

elements.name: checkbox
elements.description: 多选项目

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: checkbox标识

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: 当前是否选中，可用来设置默认选中

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: checkbox的颜色

elements.name: checkbox-group
elements.description: 多项选择器，内部由多个checkbox组成。

elements.name: editor
elements.description: 富文本编辑器，可以对图片、文字进行编辑。

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: 设置编辑器为只读

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: 提示信息

attributes.name: show-img-size
attributes.description: 点击图片时显示图片大小控件

attributes.name: show-img-toolbar
attributes.description: 点击图片时显示工具栏控件

attributes.name: show-img-resize
attributes.description: 点击图片时显示修改尺寸控件

elements.name: form
elements.description: 表单。将组件内的用户输入的switch input checkbox slider radio picker 提交。

attributes.name: report-submit
attributes.description: 是否返回 formId 用于发送模板消息

attributes.name: report-submit-timeout
attributes.description: 等待一段时间（毫秒数）以确认 formId 是否生效

elements.name: input
elements.description: 输入框。该组件是原生组件，使用时请注意相关限制

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 输入框的初始内容

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: input 的类型

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: 是否是密码类型

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: 输入框为空时占位符

attributes.name: placeholder-style
attributes.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式

attributes.name: placeholder-class
attributes.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式类

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

attributes.name: cursor-spacing
attributes.description: 指定光标与键盘的距离，取 input 距离底部的距离和 cursor-spacing 指定的距离的最小值作为光标与键盘的距离

attributes.name: focus
attributes.description: 自动聚焦，拉起键盘

attributes.name: confirm-type
attributes.description: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅在type='text'时生效

attributes.name: confirm-hold
attributes.description: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起

attributes.name: cursor
attributes.description: 指定focus时的光标位置

attributes.name: selection-start
attributes.description: 光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

attributes.name: selection-end
attributes.description: 光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

attributes.name: adjust-position
attributes.description: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

attributes.name: hold-keyboard
attributes.description: focus时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘

elements.name: label
elements.description: 用来改进表单组件的可用性。

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: 绑定控件的 id

elements.name: picker
elements.description: 从底部弹起的滚动选择器。

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: 选择器类型

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: range
attributes.description: mode 为 selector 或 multiSelector 时，range 有效

attributes.name: range-key
attributes.description: 当 range 是一个 Object Array 时，通过 range-key 来指定 Object 中 key 的值作为选择器显示内容

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 表示选择了 range 中的第几个（下标从 0 开始）

attributes.name: end
attributes.description: 表示有效日期范围的结束，字符串格式为"YYYY-MM-DD"

attributes.name: fields
attributes.description: 表示选择器的粒度

attributes.name: start
attributes.description: 表示有效日期范围的开始，字符串格式为"YYYY-MM-DD"

attributes.name: custom-item
attributes.description: 当mode=region，可为每一列的顶部添加一个自定义的项

elements.name: picker-view
elements.description: 嵌入页面的滚动选择器。其中只可放置 picker-view-column组件，其它节点不会显示。

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 数组中的数字依次表示 picker-view 内的 picker-view-column 选择的第几项（下标从 0 开始），数字大于 picker-view-column 可选项长度时，选择最后一项。

attributes.name: indicator-style
attributes.description: 设置选择器中间选中框的样式

attributes.name: indicator-class
attributes.description: 设置选择器中间选中框的类名

attributes.name: mask-style
attributes.description: 设置蒙层的样式

attributes.name: mask-class
attributes.description: 设置蒙层的类名

elements.name: picker-view-column
elements.description: 滚动选择器子项。仅可放置于picker-view中，其孩子节点的高度会自动设置成与picker-view的选中框的高度一致

elements.name: radio
elements.description: 单选项目

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: radio 标识

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: 当前是否选中

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: radio的颜色

elements.name: radio-group
elements.description: 单项选择器，内部由多个 radio 组成。

elements.name: slider
elements.description: 滑动选择器。

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: 最小值

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: 最大值

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: 步长，取值必须大于 0，并且可被(max - min)整除

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 当前取值

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: 背景条的颜色（请使用 backgroundColor）

attributes.name: selected-color
attributes.description: 已选择的颜色（请使用 activeColor）

attributes.name: activeColor
attributes.description: 已选择的颜色

attributes.name: backgroundColor
attributes.description: 背景条的颜色

attributes.name: block-size
attributes.description: 滑块的大小，取值范围为 12 - 28

attributes.name: block-color
attributes.description: 滑块的颜色

attributes.name: show-value
attributes.description: 是否显示当前 value

elements.name: switch
elements.description: 开关选择器。

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: 是否选中

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: 样式，有效值：switch, checkbox

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: switch 的颜色

elements.name: textarea
elements.description: 多行输入框。该组件是原生组件，使用时请注意相关限制。

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: 输入框的内容

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: 输入框为空时占位符

attributes.name: placeholder-style
attributes.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式

attributes.name: placeholder-class
attributes.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式类

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: 是否禁用

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

attributes.name: focus
attributes.description: 获取焦点

attributes.name: auto-height
attributes.description: 是否自动增高，设置auto-height时，style.height不生效

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description: 如果 textarea 是在一个 position:fixed 的区域，需要显示指定属性 fixed 为 true

attributes.name: cursor-spacing
attributes.description: 指定光标与键盘的距离

attributes.name: cursor
attributes.description: 指定focus时的光标位置

attributes.name: show-confirm-bar
attributes.description: 是否显示键盘上方带有”完成“按钮那一栏

attributes.name: selection-start
attributes.description: 光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

attributes.name: selection-end
attributes.description: 光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

attributes.name: adjust-position
attributes.description: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

attributes.name: hold-keyboard
attributes.description: focus时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘

elements.name: functional-page-navigator
elements.description: 仅在插件中有效，用于跳转到插件功能页。

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: 跳转到的小程序版本，线上版本必须设置为 release

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: 要跳转到的功能页

attributes.name: args
attributes.description: 功能页参数，参数格式与具体功能页相关

elements.name: navigator
elements.description: 页面链接。

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: 在哪个目标上发生跳转，默认当前小程序

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: 当前小程序内的跳转链接

attributes.name: open-type
attributes.description: 跳转方式

attributes.name: delta

attributes.name: hover-stay-time

elements.name: canvas

attributes.description: 指定 canvas 类型，支持 2d (2.9.0) 和 webgl (2.7.0)

attributes.name: canvas-id
attributes.description: canvas 组件的唯一标识符，若指定了 type 则无需再指定该属性

attributes.description: 当在 canvas 中移动时且有绑定手势事件时，禁止屏幕滚动以及下拉刷新

elements.name: official-account

elements.name: open-data
elements.description: 用于展示微信开放的数据。

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: 开放数据类型

attributes.name: open-gid
attributes.description: 当 type="groupName" 时生效, 群id

attributes.name: lang

attributes.name: default-text

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: webview 指向网页的链接

elements.name: navigation-bar
elements.description: 页面导航条配置节点，用于指定导航栏的一些属性。只能是 page-meta 组件内的第一个节点，需要配合它一同使用。

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: 导航条标题

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: 是否在导航条显示 loading 加载提示

attributes.name: front-color
attributes.description: 导航条前景颜色值，包括按钮、标题、状态栏的颜色，仅支持 #ffffff 和 #000000

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: 导航条背景颜色值，有效值为十六进制颜色

attributes.name: color-animation-duration
attributes.description: 改变导航栏颜色时的动画时长，默认为 0 （即没有动画效果）

attributes.name: color-animation-timing-func
attributes.description: 改变导航栏颜色时的动画方式

elements.name: page-meta
elements.description: 页面属性配置节点，用于指定页面的一些属性、监听页面事件。只能是页面内的第一个节点。可以配合 navigation-bar 组件一同使用。

attributes.name: background-text-style
attributes.description: 下拉背景字体、loading 图的样式，仅支持 dark 和 light

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: 窗口的背景色，必须为十六进制颜色值

attributes.name: background-color-top
attributes.description: 顶部窗口的背景色，必须为十六进制颜色值，仅 iOS 支持

attributes.name: background-color-bottom
attributes.description: 底部窗口的背景色，必须为十六进制颜色值，仅 iOS 支持

attributes.name: scroll-top
attributes.description: 滚动位置，可以使用 px 或者 rpx 为单位，在被设置时，页面会滚动到对应位置

attributes.name: scroll-duration
attributes.description: 滚动动画时长

attributes.name: page-style
attributes.description: 页面根节点样式，页面根节点是所有页面节点的祖先节点，相当于 HTML 中的 body 节点

attributes.name: root-font-size
attributes.description: 页面的根字体大小，页面中的所有 rem 单位，将使用这个字体大小作为参考值，即 1rem 等于这个字体大小

attributes.name: data-*
attributes.description: The `data-*` global attributes form a class of attributes called custom data attributes, that allow proprietary information to be exchanged between the HTML and its DOM representation by scripts.

attributes.name: Wx directive
attributes.description: Directives are special attributes with the `v-` prefix. Directive attribute values are expected to be a single JavaScript expression (with the exception of `v-for` and `v-on`). A directive's job is to reactively apply side effects to the DOM when the value of its expression changes.

attributes.name: v-on alias
attributes.description:
Attaches an event listener to the element. The event type is denoted by the argument. The expression can be a method name, an inline statement, or omitted if there are modifiers present.

When used on a normal element, it listens to *native DOM events* only. When used on a custom element component, it listens to *custom events* emitted on that child component.

When listening to native DOM events, the method receives the native event as the only argument. If using inline statement, the statement has access to the special `$event` property: `v-on:click="handle('ok', $event)"`.

`v-on` also supports binding to an object of event/listener pairs without an argument. Note when using the object syntax, it does not support any modifiers.

attributes.name: v-bind alias
attributes.description:
Dynamically bind one or more attributes, or a component prop to an expression.

When used to bind the `class` or `style` attribute, it supports additional value types such as Array or Objects. See linked guide section below for more details.

When used for prop binding, the prop must be properly declared in the child component.

When used without an argument, can be used to bind an object containing attribute name-value pairs. Note in this mode `class` and `style` does not support Array or Objects.

attributes.name: v-slot alias
attributes.description: Denote named slots or slots that expect to receive props.

attributes.name: slot
attributes.description: Denote named slots or slots that expect to receive props.

attributes.name: bind
attributes.description: 让 bind + (:?) + eventType 作为属性值

attributes.name: catch
attributes.description:
让 catch + (:?) + eventType 作为属性值

除 bind 外，也可以用 catch 来绑定事件。与 bind 不同，catch 会阻止事件向上冒泡。

attributes.name: capture-bind
attributes.description:
让 capture-bind + (:?) + eventType 作为属性值

capture-bind要在bind之前执行，是因为事件是先捕获后冒泡，注意：仅触摸类事件支持捕获阶段

attributes.name: capture-catch
attributes.description:
让 capture-catch + (:?) + eventType 作为属性值

capture-catch中断捕获阶段和取消冒泡阶段

attributes.name: is
attributes.description: Used for [dynamic components](https://v3.vuejs.org/guide/component-dynamic-async.html).

vue-file-top-elements.name: style
vue-file-top-elements.description: The top-level `<style>` element serves as a container for the component styles.

vue-file-top-elements.name: script
vue-file-top-elements.description: The top-level `<script>` element serves as a container for the component code.

vue-file-top-elements.name: template
vue-file-top-elements.description: The top-level `<template>` element serves as a container for the component template contents.

vue-components.name: Component
vue-components.description: A “meta component” for rendering dynamic components. The actual component to render is determined by the `is` prop.

props.name: is
props.description: An HTML tag name, a Component name or Component class reference.

props.name: name
props.description: Used to automatically generate transition CSS class names. e.g. `name: 'fade'` will auto expand to `.fade-enter`, `.fade-enter-active`, etc.

props.name: appear
props.description: Whether to apply transition on initial render.

props.name: css
props.description: Whether to apply CSS transition classes. Defaults to `true`. If set to `false`, will only trigger JavaScript hooks registered via component events.

props.name: type
props.description: Specifies the type of transition events to wait for to determine transition end timing. Available values are `"transition"` and `"animation"`. By default, it will automatically detect the type that has a longer duration.

props.name: duration
props.description: Specifies the duration of transition. By default, Vue waits for the first `transitionend` or `animationend` event on the root transition element.

vue-components.name: Transition
vue-components.description: `<transition>` serve as transition effects for *single* element/component. The `<transition>` only applies the transition behavior to the wrapped content inside; it doesn't render an extra DOM element, or show up in the inspected component hierarchy.

props.name: mode
props.description: Controls the timing sequence of leaving/entering transitions. Available modes are `"out-in"` and `"in-out"`; defaults to simultaneous.

values.name: out-in
values.description: Current element transitions out first, then when complete, the new element transitions in.

values.name: in-out
values.description: New element transitions in first, then when complete, the current element transitions out.

vue-components.name: TransitionGroup
vue-components.description:
`<transition-group>` serve as transition effects for *multiple* elements/components. The `<transition-group>` renders a real DOM element. By default it renders a `<span>`, and you can configure what element it should render via the `tag` attribute.

Note that every child in a `<transition-group>` must be *uniquely keyed* for the animations to work properly.

props.name: moveClass
props.description: Overwrite CSS class applied during moving transition

vue-components.name: KeepAlive
vue-components.description:
When wrapped around a dynamic component, `<keep-alive>` caches the inactive component instances without destroying them. Similar to `<transition>`, `<keep-alive>` is an abstract component: it doesn’t render a DOM element itself, and doesn’t show up in the component parent chain.

When a component is toggled inside `<keep-alive>`, its `activated` and `deactivated` lifecycle hooks will be invoked accordingly.

Primarily used to preserve component state or avoid re-rendering.

props.name: include
props.description: Only components with matching names will be cached.

props.name: exclude
props.description: Any component with a matching name will not be cached.

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum number of component instances to cache.

vue-components.name: Suspense
vue-components.description: Suspense is a special component that renders a fallback content instead of child components until a condition is met. This condition is usually async operation happening in the components setup function.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to render once async operation is finished

slots.name: fallback
slots.description: Content to render during async operation

vue-components.name: Teleport
vue-components.description: Teleport provides a clean way to control under which parent in our DOM a piece of HTML will be rendered, without having to resort to global state or splitting elements into two components.

props.name: to
props.description: A valid query selector, or an HTMLElement (if used in a browser environment). Specifies a target element where `<teleport>` content will be moved

props.name: disabled
props.description: Used to disable the `<teleport>`'s functionality, which means that its slot content will not be moved anywhere and instead be rendered where you specified the `<teleport>` in the surrounding parent component.

vue-directives.name: show
vue-directives.description:
Toggles the element’s `display` CSS property based on the truthy-ness of the expression value.

This directive triggers transitions when its condition changes.

vue-directives.name: if
vue-directives.description:
Conditionally render the element based on the truthy-ness of the expression value. The element and its contained directives / components are destroyed and re-constructed during toggles. If the element is a `<template>` element, its content will be extracted as the conditional block.

This directive triggers transitions when its condition changes.

vue-directives.name: else
vue-directives.description: Denote the “else block” for `v-if` or a `v-if/v-else-if` chain.

vue-directives.name: elif
vue-directives.description: Denote the “else if block” for `v-if`. Can be chained.

vue-directives.name: for
vue-directives.description: Render the element or template block multiple times based on the source data. The directive’s value must use the special syntax `alias in expression` to provide an alias for the current element being iterated on. Alternatively, you can also specify an alias for the index (or the key if used on an Object). The default behavior of `v-for` will try to patch the elements in-place without moving them. To force it to reorder elements, you need to provide an ordering hint with the `key` special attribute.

vue-directives.name: for-index
vue-directives.description: 使用 wx:for-index 可以指定数组当前下标的变量名：

vue-directives.name: for-item
vue-directives.description: 使用 wx:for-item 可以指定数组当前元素的变量名：

vue-directives.name: key
vue-directives.description:
如果列表中项目的位置会动态改变或者有新的项目添加到列表中，并且希望列表中的项目保持自己的特征和状态，需要使用 wx:key 来指定列表中项目的唯一的标识符。 注意：如不提供 wx:key，会报一个 warning， 如果明确知道该列表是静态，或者不必关注其顺序，可以选择忽略。

有相同父元素的子元素必须有独特的 key。重复的 key 会造成渲染错误。

vue-directives.name: class
vue-directives.description: 绑定HTML Class: 类似vue的class绑定

vue-directives.name: style
vue-directives.description: wx:style 的对象语法十分直观——看着非常像 CSS，但其实是一个 JavaScript 对象。CSS property 名可以用驼峰式 (camelCase) 或短横线分隔 (kebab-case) 来命名：

vue-directives.name: ref
vue-directives.description: Mpx提供了 wx:ref=xxx 来更方便获取 WXML 节点信息的对象。在JS里只需要通过this.$refs.xxx 即可获取节点。

vue-directives.name: model
vue-directives.description: Create a two-way binding on a form input element or a component. For detailed usage and other notes, see the Guide section.

modifiers.name: prop
modifiers.description: wx:model 默认使用 value 属性传值，使用 wx:model-prop 定义 wx:model 指令对应的属性；

modifiers.name: event
modifiers.description: wx:model 默认监听 input 事件，可以使用 wx:model-event 定义 wx:model 指令对应的事件；

modifiers.name: value-path
modifiers.description: 指定 wx:model 双向绑定时的取值路径； 并非所有的组件都会按微信的标注格式 event.detail.value 来传值，例如 vant 的 input 组件，值是通过抛出 event.detail 本身传递的，这时我们可以使用 wx:model-value-path="[]" 重新指定取值路径。

modifiers.name: filter
modifiers.description: 在使用 wx:model 时我们可能需要像 Vue 的 .trim 、.lazy 这样的修饰符来对双向数据绑定的数据进行过滤和修饰；Mpx 通过增强指令 wx:model-filter 可以实现这一功能； 该指令可以绑定内建的 filter 或者自定义的 filter 方法，该方法接收过滤前的值，返回过滤操作后的值。

bind-directives.name: touchcancel
bind-directives.description: 手指触摸动作被打断，如来电提醒，弹窗

bind-directives.name: longpress
bind-directives.description: 手指触摸后，超过350ms再离开，如果指定了事件回调函数并触发了这个事件，tap事件将不被触发

bind-directives.name: longtap
bind-directives.description: 手指触摸后，超过350ms再离开（推荐使用longpress事件代替）

bind-directives.name: transitionend
bind-directives.description: 会在 WXSS transition 或 wx.createAnimation 动画结束后触发

bind-directives.name: animationstart
bind-directives.description: 会在一个 WXSS animation 动画开始时触发

bind-directives.name: animationiteration
bind-directives.description: 会在一个 WXSS animation 一次迭代结束时触发

bind-directives.name: animationend
bind-directives.description: 会在一个 WXSS animation 动画完成时触发

bind-directives.name: touchforcechange
bind-directives.description: 在支持 3D Touch 的 iPhone 设备，重按时会触发

vue-dynamic-argument.name: Dynamic directive argument
vue-dynamic-argument.description:
It is possible to use a JavaScript expression in a directive argument by wrapping it with square brackets. The expression's evaluated value will be used as the final value for the argument.

Dynamic arguments are expected to evaluate to a string, with the exception of `null`. The special value `null` can be used to explicitly remove the binding. Any other non-string value will trigger a warning.

functions.name: v-bind
functions.description:
Use `v-bind` to links CSS values to dynamic Vue component state. The syntax works with `<script setup>`, and supports JavaScript expressions, which must be wrapped in quotes.

The actual value will be compiled into a hashed CSS custom property, so the CSS is still static.

pseudo-classes.name: deep
pseudo-classes.description: Make a rule that targets child components.

pseudo-classes.name: slotted
pseudo-classes.description: In v3 child scoped styles are **not** affecting slot content by default. To explicitly target slot content, the `::v-slotted()` (shorthand: `:slotted()`) pseudo element can be used.

pseudo-classes.name: global
pseudo-classes.description: Use `::v-global()` (shorthand: `:global()`) pseudo element to make a one-off global rule within scoped `<style>` block.

pseudo-elements.name: v-deep
pseudo-elements.description:
Make a rule that targets child components.

**Note: usage without arguments is deprecated since Vue 3.0.**

pseudo-elements.name: v-deep
pseudo-elements.description: Make a rule that targets child components.

pseudo-elements.name: v-slotted
pseudo-elements.description: In v3 child scoped styles are **not** affecting slot content by default. To explicitly target slot content, the `::v-slotted()` (shorthand: `:slotted()`) pseudo element can be used.

pseudo-elements.name: v-global
pseudo-elements.description: Use `::v-global()` (shorthand: `:global()`) pseudo element to make a one-off global rule within scoped `<style>` block.
